CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Underwriters at Lloyd's London", Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2018,9,1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2020,4,1) ), "BY1",
IF ( AND( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Underwriters at Lloyd's London", Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2020,4,2), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2021,1,31) ), "BY2",
IF ( AND( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Underwriters at Lloyd's London", Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2021,2,1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2021,12,31) ), "BY3",
IF ( AND( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Underwriters at Lloyd's London", Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2022,1,1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2023,3,31) ), "BY4",
IF ( AND( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Underwriters at Lloyd's London", Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2023,4,1) ), "BY5",
IF( OR( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Knight Specialty Insurance Company", Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "United Specialty Insurance Company" ), "BY1",
IF( AND( Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2023,4,30), AND(OR( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Trisura Specialty Insurance Company", Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Bricktown Specialty Insurance Company" ))), "BY1",
IF( AND( Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2023,5,1), AND(OR( Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Trisura Specialty Insurance Company", Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name = "Bricktown Specialty Insurance Company" ))), "BY2",
NULL ))))))))
CustomField.label: Scale Binder Year
